ygData.subject: Re: Introduction
ygData.msgSnippet: Only person able to hunt at PoF. Not necessary means can go into PoF. btw, PoH is open liao. but duno where or how to get there. Plane of Hate ... From: LKW
ygData.messageBody:
Only person able to hunt at PoF. Not necessary means can go into PoF.
btw, PoH is open liao. but duno where or how to get there. Plane of Hate
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, August 30, 1999 09:10
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Introduction


> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Err, how can a druid go POF by himself? I thot only wiz got plane spells?
>
> On Friday, 27 August, 1999 10:29 PM, Gary Qui Hong Loong
[SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
> > From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> >
> > Level 50 on Quellious
> > Community News [ 1:37 AM EDT ] - Den
> > From Dale:
> >
> > On Thursday, August 26th near 8 eastern, Marc, was
> > the
> > first person to get level 50 on Quellious. Not
> > only is he the
> > only person to be able to hunt in Plane of Fear,
> > but he got to
> > level 50 all by himself. The first and only level
> > 50 Druid on
> > the server. Congrats Marc!
> >
> > Thanks!
> >
> >
> > Wah. Super power lvling. He can buy EQ account and power lvl char to
> > sell as a living liao.
> >
> > Gary Qui Hong Loong wrote:
> > >
> > > From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> > >
> > > U're Ms Innoruuk 1999 what.
> > >
> > > Sereph wrote:
> > > >
> > > > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> > > >
> > > > CCB, everytime must use me as an advertising tool........
> > > >
> > > > Fesse Estasis, eternally 1 short of Rank 6
> > > >
> > > > LKW wrote:
> > > >
> > > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > > >
> > > > > 95% of us play in Innoruuk server. One chao-ah-aqua got a lvl 49
enchanter
> > > > > in CT server but he still managed to train a lvl 20 plus cleric &
a lvl 20
> > > > > plus bard in Innoruuk in a short time. Why? Becoz all kakis very
close and
> > > > > helpful. We even intend to start a SG guild and accept mainly
local kakis
> > > > > and those trust-worthy friends from other nations. We also got a
big rich
> > > > > guy in Innoruuk who can extend any financial loan service to you.
;-P
> > > > >
> > > > > How come u are still in EM server???
> > > > >
> > > > > Ziltus Planeswalker
> > > > >
> > > > > On Friday, 27 August, 1999 1:52 PM, Terence Tan Kar Chuan
> > > > > [SMTP:hawklair@...] wrote:
> > > > > > From: "Terence Tan Kar Chuan" <hawklair@...>
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Hi, my name is Terence and I am from Singapore too. I am so
happy that I
> > > > > > could find a local EQ mailing list. Just want to know what
server are u
> > > > > > guys/gals playing on? My main character is on the Errollisi
Marr. If you
> > > > > > happen to be on the same server as me, we could have a game or
not this
> > > > > > coming weekend.
